question: What ministry do you think I would do very well in?
How do you think your friends would describe your walk with Christ?
If my faith were a book, what would the title be?
Which Christian song or hymn shares a special place in your heart and why?
What is the best greeting time question you've heard?
If I was called to church discipline, what do you think it would be for?
If I went on a mission trip, what top 5 things do you think I would bring?
What do you think I spend most of my time doing?
Do you think I was popular in school? Explain.
Do I seem like someone who would enter into full time ministry? Explain why or why not.
Look at my most recently-liked Christian song. What does it tell you about me?
What was your first impression of me?
What do you wish you knew about me?
Do I remind you of anyone (from church or from the Bible)?
Tell me something about yourself that nobody would guess just by looking at you.
What is the first thing you noticed about me?
Which book of the Bible do you think I enjoy reading the most?
What Christmas present do you think I would appreciate?
Do I seem like a first-generation Christian? Why or why not?
What do you think my love languages are?
Share your favourite part of church service.
What do you think I've been complimented about very often?
Faith, hope, and love. Which one do you think I excel at the most?
If I brought a snack to church, what do you think it would be?
What do you think my appearance tells you about my faith?
Do I seem like someone who will study the Bible more, or go out and carry out deeds of faith more? Why?
Describe me in 3 words.
What would a younger you be impressed about with your faith today?
Describe a turning point of your Christian faith.
What false or inaccurate beliefs have you had to give up? How did you do it?
What would you say to someone who is discouraged and downtrodden in their faith?
What is a Bible verse that has had a huge impact on your life, and why?
Describe a time when you felt God's presence most strongly in your life.
How is your relationship with God? Be honest.
What is the most challenging thing about being a Christian in your life now?
Share a Christian author or theologian who has influenced your spiritual journey.
What aspect of faith are you still struggling with or doubting about?
Describe a church-related experience that has made a huge impact or impression on you.
How would you disagree with a fellow Christian and still show them love?
Be honest. What ticks you off about some Christians?
Share a time when you felt disconnected from identifying as a Christian. What happened?
Was there a time that you were judged for your faith? Describe the situation.
Share one thing you wish your church did differently.
What are some things that you are doing to build the church?
What do you believe is your God-given purpose in life, and how are you acting on it?
What was the most uncomfortable thing you have had to do for your faith?
What does living out your faith look like in your career or daily work?
What legacy do you wish to leave in your church?
Discuss a Christian organization or cause that you're passionate about supporting.
What is something you wish your church learned from the external world?
Is there a faith activity that you only do with Christians, but never do by yourself in secret? Why?
Have you ever lied to a minister or a church leader? Explain.
What do you look out for in a Christian partner?
What are some traits that you dislike about a person?
Which traits from your parents do you want to keep / let go?
How would you raise your child to know God?
What is a past sin of yours that brings feelings of guilt and shame?
If we were to work together in a ministry, which one would it be?
What about me has surprised you so far?
What do you think I need to hear right now?
What do you think God wants me to know right now?
Has anything about my faith encouraged you? Elaborate.
What would you like prayer for?
What am I most qualified to give advice about?
What aspects of faith do you think we share?
What have you learned from this conversation?
How do you see me contributing to God's kingdom?
What is one thing you wish more people knew about me?
What would help you feel closer to me?
How can I help you?
What kind of people do you see me reaching for Christ?
What do you think God's calling is for my life?
Activity: Take a selfie together to remember this moment.
What are you grateful to God for right now?
What do you need right now, but are too afraid to ask for?
Which part of your life is going well right now?
How has God blessed you this past year?
What are you working out in your faith right now that others do not see? How can I help?
Fill in the blanks: I feel loved when ___.
How would you describe me to a stranger?
